analyzed: 'dab ma'i chang bu zhes @338a * //
translated: A bamboo tube is a tube made from bamboo.🔽A leaf tube is a tube made from a collection of leaves or petals.

original: bya ba lo ma'am 'dab ma'i tshogs bsdus pa cang cang po khru da shing bu byas pa shing bu'i rtse mo la btags pas sam /
analyzed: bya ba lo ma'am 'dab ma'i tshogs bsdus pa cang cang po khru da shing bu byas pa shing bu'i rtse mo la btags pas sam /
translated: A cloth tube is a tube made from a bundle of cloth.

original: ras ma dril ba shing bu'i rtse mo la btags pas drud cing bkru bshal bya'o //
analyzed: ras ma dril ba shing bu'i rtse mo la btags pas drud cing bkru bshal bya'o //
translated: One should wash the vessels by pulling the tube through them.

original: de la zas kyi 'bram zer mi bsrung ba nyid du mi bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la zas kyi 'bram zer mi bsrung ba nyid du mi bya ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One should not use a vessel that is cracked or broken.

original: pu shel tsi'i khru da shing la sogs pa de dag las zas kyi 'bram zer zhes bya ba zas kyi dum grugs kyis gos shing zang zing can du 'gyur ba de mi bsrung ba nyid du mi bya ste /
analyzed: pu shel tsi'i khru da shing la sogs pa de dag las zas kyi 'bram zer zhes bya ba zas kyi dum grugs kyis gos shing zang zing can du 'gyur ba de mi bsrung ba nyid du mi bya ste /
translated: One should not fail to protect those things that are used for food, such as the water for rinsing the mouth, the water for drinking, the water for washing, the wooden implements, the metal implements, and the ceramic implements.

original: bsrung ba nyid du bya'o //
analyzed: bsrung ba nyid du bya'o //
translated: One should protect them.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is the explanation.

original: zang zing med pa'i pu shel ci'i khrud shing la sogs pas spyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: zang zing med pa'i pu shel ci'i khrud shing la sogs pas spyar bar bya'o //
translated: One should use the water for rinsing the mouth, the water for drinking, the water for washing, the wooden implements, the metal implements, and the ceramic implements that are not used for food.

original: bskam par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bskam par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “One should dry them” means

original: chu snod bkru bshal byas pa rnams bskam par yang bya'o //
analyzed: chu snod bkru bshal byas pa rnams bskam par yang bya'o //
translated: that one should dry the water vessels that have been washed and rinsed.

original: de'i tshe brel bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir cig car nyid du mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i tshe brel bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir cig car nyid du mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “One should not do them all at once” means

original: bkru ba dang skam pa de dag byed pa de'i tshe snod spyad kyis brel bar gyur pa na mi rung bas brel bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir cig car dus gcig nyid du mi bya bar mthar gyis bkru ba dang bskam par bya ste /
analyzed: bkru ba dang skam pa de dag byed pa de'i tshe snod spyad kyis brel bar gyur pa na mi rung bas brel bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir cig car dus gcig nyid du mi bya bar mthar gyis bkru ba dang bskam par bya ste /
translated: that one should not wash and dry them all at the same time, because it would be inappropriate to be busy with the vessels while one is doing those things. One should wash and dry them gradually, in order to avoid being busy.

original: snod thams cad dus gcig tu bkru ba dang / bskam par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: snod thams cad dus gcig tu bkru ba dang / bskam par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is not that all vessels are to be washed and dried at the same time.

original: chu dang 'brel ba'i las ni gnas pas bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: chu dang 'brel ba'i las ni gnas pas bya ba yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The duties related to water are to be performed by the resident monks.

original: chu dang 'brel pa'i las ji skad sngar bstan pa de dag dang gzhan dag kyang gnas pa slob ma dang nye gnas dag gis bya ba yin no //
analyzed: chu dang 'brel pa'i las ji skad sngar bstan pa de dag dang gzhan dag kyang gnas pa slob ma dang nye gnas dag gis bya ba yin no //
translated: The duties related to water, as previously explained, and other duties are to be performed by the resident monks and the pupils.🔽Here, the text states that the Blessed One said, “You should take the water.”

original: 'dir gzhung ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chu blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis sus blang bar bya ba mi shes nas /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chu blang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis sus blang bar bya ba mi shes nas /
translated: The monks did not know who should take it,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: so the Blessed One said,

original: gnas pa dag gis bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //🔽chu gang gi 'khor du gtogs pa dang chu tshags la sogs pa'i ni chu dang 'brel pa'i las yin no //
analyzed: gnas pa dag gis bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no // chu gang gi 'khor du gtogs pa dang chu tshags la sogs pa'i ni chu dang 'brel pa'i las yin no //
translated: “The residents should do it.”🔽The duties related to water are those related to the water vessel and so on.

original: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu dang 'brel ba phran tshegs la sogs pa'i skabs so zhes bya ba de rdzogs so //
analyzed: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu dang 'brel ba phran tshegs la sogs pa'i skabs so zhes bya ba de rdzogs so //
translated: The section on minor matters related to water and living beings is completed.

original: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba de bshad zin to /
analyzed: srog chags dang bcas pa'i chu la spyod pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba de bshad zin to /
translated: The offense of “using water containing living beings” has been explained.

original: // / nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed smra bar 'dod nas /
analyzed: // / nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed smra bar 'dod nas /
translated: The offense of “sitting in the house of a couple preparing to have sexual intercourse” is as follows:

original: shes gtso bo zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: shes gtso bo zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: The Buddha said, “If one says, ‘The chief is aware,’

original: 'dir yang shes gtso zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid @338b do zhes bya ba'i ming can du sbyor bar byed do //
analyzed: 'dir yang shes gtso zhes bya ba'i ming dang 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid @338b do zhes bya ba'i ming can du sbyor bar byed do //
translated: and here, the term ‘chief’ is applied to the one who is the chief in terms of perception.

original: gang la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: If you ask, “Who is the chief in terms of perception?”

original: zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la'o zhes smras te /
analyzed: zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la'o zhes smras te /
translated: he said, “One who is engaged or inclined.”

original: zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhugs pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Engaged” means

original: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'o //
translated: one who is engaged in sexual intercourse.

original: phyogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'khrig pa'i phyir rtsom pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyogs pa zhes bya ba ni 'khrig pa'i phyir rtsom pa nyid do //
translated: “Inclined” means one who is just beginning to have sexual intercourse.

original: de gnyis la de ltar shes na yul de la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis la de ltar shes na yul de la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
translated: If one knows that these two are engaged in sexual intercourse, then one is the chief in terms of perception with regard to that object.

original: ji zhig la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ji zhig la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: What is meant by “engaged in” or “directed toward”?

original: 'khrig pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: 'khrig pa la'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore he says: “in sexual intercourse.”

original: gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa la zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is: in the joining of the two organs.

original: gang gi 'khrig pa la zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: gang gi 'khrig pa la zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: In whose sexual intercourse?

original: skyes pa dang bud med kyi'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: skyes pa dang bud med kyi'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore he says: “of a man and a woman.”

original: skyes pa dang bud med kyi 'khrig pa la'o //
analyzed: skyes pa dang bud med kyi 'khrig pa la'o //
translated: In the sexual intercourse of a man and a woman.

original: skyes pa dang bud med ji ltar gyur pa zhig gis she na /
analyzed: skyes pa dang bud med ji ltar gyur pa zhig gis she na /
translated: In what state are the man and woman?

original: de'i phyir / khyim pa nyid do zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / khyim pa nyid do zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore he says: “as householders.”

original: gal te skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis khyim pa nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: gal te skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis khyim pa nyid yin na'o //
translated: If the man and woman are householders.

original: gal te spyir zla gcig mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong la sogs pa khyim pa ma yin na de'i tshe nyes byas so //
analyzed: gal te spyir zla gcig mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong la sogs pa khyim pa ma yin na de'i tshe nyes byas so //
translated: If in general, a monk is not a householder, then at that time there is an offense of wrong conduct.

original: ji de gnyis gnas gang na 'dug kyang rung ngam zhe na /
analyzed: ji de gnyis gnas gang na 'dug kyang rung ngam zhe na /
translated: In what place are the two?

original: de'i phyir / gnas gzhan nyid na'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / gnas gzhan nyid na'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore he says: “in another place.”

original: gnas de gal te dge slong de nyid kyi ma yin na ste gnas de skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis kyi gnyi ga'i 'am /
analyzed: gnas de gal te dge slong de nyid kyi ma yin na ste gnas de skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis kyi gnyi ga'i 'am /
translated: If that place is not the monk’s own dwelling, but is the dwelling of both a man and a woman,

original: gang yang rung ba'i gnas yin na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gang yang rung ba'i gnas yin na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: or the dwelling of either one of them.

original: nyes pa 'di ni de gnyis la gnod par gyur pa las bzhag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: nyes pa 'di ni de gnyis la gnod par gyur pa las bzhag pa yin gyi /
translated: This fault is established from the perspective of harm to those two.

original: dge slong gi rang gi gnas nyid du ni nyes pa 'dir mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong gi rang gi gnas nyid du ni nyes pa 'dir mi 'gyur ro //
translated: But it is not a fault for the monk to be in his own dwelling.

original: gal te khyim pa'i gnas de khyim bdag gis dge slong la g-yar por byin zhing de na dge slong 'dug pa yin na ni de'i tshe ltung ba med do //
analyzed: gal te khyim pa'i gnas de khyim bdag gis dge slong la g-yar por byin zhing de na dge slong 'dug pa yin na ni de'i tshe ltung ba med do //
translated: If that dwelling of a layperson is lent to the monk by the layperson, and the monk stays there, then there is no offense.

original: gal te gnas de dge slong gi yin la /
analyzed: gal te gnas de dge slong gi yin la /
translated: If that dwelling belongs to the monk,

original: dge slong gis khyim pa la g-yar por byin zhing dge slong der 'dug na ni de'i tshe kha na ma tho ba rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dge slong gis khyim pa la g-yar por byin zhing dge slong der 'dug na ni de'i tshe kha na ma tho ba rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the monk lends it to a layperson, and the monk stays there, then at that time there is a complete offense.

original: de bzhin du dgon pa la yang gal te dge slong snga ma gnas pa yin na ni de la ltung ba med do //
analyzed: de bzhin du dgon pa la yang gal te dge slong snga ma gnas pa yin na ni de la ltung ba med do //
translated: Similarly, if a monk is staying in a wilderness dwelling, and it is not his own dwelling, then there is no offense.

original: khyim pa snga na gnas pa'i drung du dge slong phyis 'ongs te 'dug na ni kha na ma tho ba rdzogs par 'gyur ro //🔽mu stegs can dang rab tu byung ba 'di gnyis gtsug lag khang gcig na gnas pa gang yin pa de yang gnas @339a * //
analyzed: khyim pa snga na gnas pa'i drung du dge slong phyis 'ongs te 'dug na ni kha na ma tho ba rdzogs par 'gyur ro // mu stegs can dang rab tu byung ba 'di gnyis gtsug lag khang gcig na gnas pa gang yin pa de yang gnas @339a * //
translated: If a fully ordained monk later comes to the house where a householder is already staying, then the monk would complete the offense.

original: gzhan nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: If a non-Buddhist and a renunciant stay in the same monastery, that is also to be understood as a different place.

original: ji gnas gzhan tsam 'ba' zhig la 'di rnam par gzhag gam zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ji gnas gzhan tsam 'ba' zhig la 'di rnam par gzhag gam zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: Is this established only as a different place? Therefore it is said:

original: gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid na'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid na'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: If it is suitable to engage in sexual intercourse due to the absence of others.

original: gnas gzhan de na skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis kyi drung na mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis 'khrig pa spyad pa sprad du rung ba nyid yin na de'i tshe dge slong der 'dug na kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gnas gzhan de na skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis kyi drung na mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis 'khrig pa spyad pa sprad du rung ba nyid yin na de'i tshe dge slong der 'dug na kha na ma tho ba 'dir 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is suitable to engage in sexual intercourse due to the absence of other people in that different place in front of a man and a woman, then at that time if a fully ordained monk stays there, this offense would occur.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is explained as follows:

original: gal te gnas de na dge slong de ma gtogs par mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis 'khrig pa spyad du rung ba nyid yin la de'i tshe dge slong der 'dug na kha na tho ba 'dir 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: gal te gnas de na dge slong de ma gtogs par mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis 'khrig pa spyad du rung ba nyid yin la de'i tshe dge slong der 'dug na kha na tho ba 'dir 'gyur gyi /
translated: If there is no other man in that place except that monk, and if it is proper for that man and woman to engage in sexual intercourse, then that monk would incur this offense if he remained there.

original: mi gzhan yod na ni ltung ba med do //
analyzed: mi gzhan yod na ni ltung ba med do //
translated: But if there is another man, there is no offense.

original: ji zhig rjes su sgrub na de byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji zhig rjes su sgrub na de byed pa po nyid yin zhe na /
translated: What does one do in order to commit this offense?

original: de'i phyir / mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug na'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: de'i phyir / mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug na'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: Therefore it says, “If he remains, having been invited to be present.”

original: ma bsgribs par mngon sum du brang pas 'dug na'o //🔽mngon sum du brang pas zhes bya ba 'di ni so sor thar pa'i mdo las nan gyis then te stan la 'dug na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: ma bsgribs par mngon sum du brang pas 'dug na'o // mngon sum du brang pas zhes bya ba 'di ni so sor thar pa'i mdo las nan gyis then te stan la 'dug na ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa de bsdus pa yin no //
translated: If he remains without concealment, having been invited to be present.🔽“Having been invited to be present” is included in the following rule in the Prātimokṣasūtra: “If he sits on a seat for the purpose of sexual intercourse, he commits an offense entailing suspension.”

original: nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba de bshad zin to /
analyzed: nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed do zhes bya ba de bshad zin to /
translated: The offense of sitting in a house where people are preparing to have sexual intercourse has already been explained.

original: // / nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed smra bar 'dod nas /
analyzed: // / nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed smra bar 'dod nas /
translated: The basis is as follows: A monk who is desirous of speaking to a householder couple who are preparing to have sexual intercourse.🔽The root mental affliction is as before.🔽The proximate factors are as follows: The monk has the thought, “I will speak to them,” and he goes to the house and stands in a place where he can see the couple.

analyzed: shes gtso bo zhes bya ba dang zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la'o zhes bya ba dang / 'khrig pa la'o zhes bya ba dang / skyes pa dang bud med kyi'o zhes bya ba dang / khyim pa nyid do zhes bya ba dang / gnas gzhan nyid na'o zhes bya ba dang / gzhan med pa nyid kyis spyad du rung ba nyid yin na'o zhes bslab pa'i gzhi snga mar bstan pa de dag thams cad 'dir yang khas blangs nas bye brag 'ga' zhig brjod par bya ste /

original: dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng na dngos gzhi'i kha na ma tho bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng na dngos gzhi'i kha na ma tho bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The monk commits an offense when the householder or his wife understands the meaning of his words.🔽The monk commits an offense when the householder or his wife understands the meaning

original: bslab pa'i gzhi snga ma dang 'di gnyis la bye brag ni 'di yod de snga ma la ni mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug na'o //
analyzed: bslab pa'i gzhi snga ma dang 'di gnyis la bye brag ni 'di yod de snga ma la ni mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug na'o //
translated: There is this difference between the former and this latter training precept: the former is to sit in a concealed place,

original: 'di la ni dben par brnag pas 'greng na'o //
analyzed: 'di la ni dben par brnag pas 'greng na'o //
translated: while this one is to stand in a concealed place.

original: des na @339b snga ma la ni dben pa brnag pas 'dug na nyes byas su 'gyur la /
analyzed: des na @339b snga ma la ni dben pa brnag pas 'dug na nyes byas su 'gyur la /
translated: Therefore, in the former, it is a minor offense to sit in a concealed place.

original: 'di la ni mngon sum du brnag pas 'greng na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la ni mngon sum du brnag pas 'greng na nyes byas su 'gyur ro //
translated: In this one, it is a minor offense to stand in a concealed place.

original: de'i phyir 'dir dben pa skyabs yod pa zhes bya ba bsdus so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir dben pa skyabs yod pa zhes bya ba bsdus so //
translated: Therefore, here “in a concealed place” is included in “in a screened place.”

original: snga ma dang 'di gnyi ga la 'gro ba dang nyal ba gnyis la ni nyes pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snga ma dang 'di gnyi ga la 'gro ba dang nyal ba gnyis la ni nyes pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: In both the former and this latter training precept, it is an offense to go and lie down.

original: ci gnas thams cad na 'greng ba'i dge slong la'am zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ci gnas thams cad na 'greng ba'i dge slong la'am zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: In all abodes, is it an offense for a monk to stand?🔽Therefore it says,

original: skyabs yod par ro zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: skyabs yod par ro zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: “in a screened place.”

original: rtsig pa'am sa ba mo'am yol ba'am mun nag la sogs pa'i sgrib pa gang yin pa des bsgribs pa'i gnas skyabs yod par 'greng ba'i dge slong la'o //
analyzed: rtsig pa'am sa ba mo'am yol ba'am mun nag la sogs pa'i sgrib pa gang yin pa des bsgribs pa'i gnas skyabs yod par 'greng ba'i dge slong la'o //
translated: A screened place is a place screened by a wall, a slope, a curtain, darkness, and so on.

original: ci dgos pa gang yang rung bas bgreng na'am zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ci dgos pa gang yang rung bas bgreng na'am zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: If one stands in any way for any reason,

original: gal te 'jigs pa'i dbang gis ma yin na'o zhes bya ba smras ste /
analyzed: gal te 'jigs pa'i dbang gis ma yin na'o zhes bya ba smras ste /
translated: then for that reason it is said, “if not through the power of fear.”

original: gal te glang po che la sogs pa 'jigs pa'i dbang gis der 'greng bar gyur na de'i tshe nyes pa med do //
analyzed: gal te glang po che la sogs pa 'jigs pa'i dbang gis der 'greng bar gyur na de'i tshe nyes pa med do //
translated: If one stands there through the power of fear of elephants and so on, then there is no offense.

original: 'dir gzhung ni gal te 'jigs par gyur na ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni gal te 'jigs par gyur na ltung ba med do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Here the text says, “If it is through fear, there is no offense.”

original: mngon sum du brang pas 'dug pa la yang 'jigs pa'i dbang gis na ltung ba med par spyar ro //
analyzed: mngon sum du brang pas 'dug pa la yang 'jigs pa'i dbang gis na ltung ba med par spyar ro //
translated: Also, if one stands there through the power of fear, even if one is standing in the direct line of sight, there is no offense.

original: ci gnas der 'greng ba thams cad dngos gzhi'i byed pa po yin nam zhe na de'i phyir /
analyzed: ci gnas der 'greng ba thams cad dngos gzhi'i byed pa po yin nam zhe na de'i phyir /
translated: If all who stand in that place are the basis of the actual basis, then for that reason it is said,

original: tshor bya dag dang tshor byed nyid kyis ma tshor na nyes byas kyi'o zhes bya ba smras te /
analyzed: tshor bya dag dang tshor byed nyid kyis ma tshor na nyes byas kyi'o zhes bya ba smras te /
translated: “If not through the power of feeling, then it is wrong conduct.”

original: tshor bya dag ces bya ba'i sgras ni sprod par byed pa gnyis brjod do //
analyzed: tshor bya dag ces bya ba'i sgras ni sprod par byed pa gnyis brjod do //
translated: The term “those who feel” refers to the two who are in union.

original: tshor byed ces bya ba'i sgras ni ltung ba 'byin ba brjod do //
analyzed: tshor byed ces bya ba'i sgras ni ltung ba 'byin ba brjod do //
translated: The term “perceiver” refers to the one who commits the downfall.

original: de ltar na tshor bya gnyis dang tshor byed gcig ni tshor bya dag dang tshor byed de de dag gi dngos po ni de nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar na tshor bya gnyis dang tshor byed gcig ni tshor bya dag dang tshor byed de de dag gi dngos po ni de nyid do //
translated: Thus, the two things that are perceived and the one who perceives them are the things that are perceived and the perceiver, and their nature is just that.

original: de nyid kyis ma tshor na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ma tshor na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “ If he does not perceive them with that” means

original: tshor bya dag dang tshor byed nyid kyis ma tshor na ste /
analyzed: tshor bya dag dang tshor byed nyid kyis ma tshor na ste /
translated: if he does not perceive them with the things that are perceived and the perceiver.

original: gal te rtsig pa la sogs pa'i skyabs de dag yod pas de na tshor bya dag dang tshor byed nyid kyis sgra grags pa tsam yang ma tshor na de'i tshe de na 'greng ba ni nyes byas kyi byed pa po nyid yin no //
analyzed: gal te rtsig pa la sogs pa'i skyabs de dag yod pas de na tshor bya dag dang tshor byed nyid kyis sgra grags pa tsam yang ma tshor na de'i tshe de na 'greng ba ni nyes byas kyi byed pa po nyid yin no //
translated: If he does not perceive the mere sound of the things that are perceived and the perceiver because of the protection of a wall, etc., then at that time he is the one who stands there and is the perpetrator of the offense.

original: 'di skad bstan te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: phyogs de na 'greng ba'i ltung ba 'byin par byed pas kyang sprod par byed pa gnyis ma tshor la sprod par byed pa gnyis kyis kyang phyogs den 'greng ba'i ltung ba 'byin par byed pa ma tshor na de'i tshe phyogs de na 'greng ba ni nyes byas kyi🔽byed pa po nyid yin no //
analyzed: phyogs de na 'greng ba'i ltung ba 'byin par byed pas kyang sprod par byed pa gnyis ma tshor la sprod par byed pa gnyis kyis kyang phyogs den 'greng ba'i ltung ba 'byin par byed pa ma tshor na de'i tshe phyogs de na 'greng ba ni nyes byas kyi byed pa po nyid yin no //
translated: Also, if the one who is standing in that place does not notice the two who are giving and the two who are giving do not notice the one who is standing in that place, then at that time the one who is standing in that place is the agent of the offense of wrong conduct.

original: gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa yang @340a * //
analyzed: gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa yang @340a * //
